Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.managers

Class StyleManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.managers.StyleManager
public class StyleManager extends Object
StyleManager contains methods for creating styled UI components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor

  • Method Details

    • createStyledButton

      public static javafx.scene.control.Button createStyledButton(String text)
      Creates a styled button with a custom font and hover effects.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the button.
      Returns:
      a styled Button object.

    • createStyledLabel

      public static javafx.scene.control.Label createStyledLabel(String text, boolean bold, double sizeFactor)
      Creates a styled label with custom font and text color.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the label.
      bold - whether the label should use a bold font.
      sizeFactor - a factor to determine the font size relative to screen height.
      Returns:
      a styled Label object.

    • createStyledDropdown

      public static <T> javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<T> createStyledDropdown()
      Creates a styled dropdown menu with custom font and hover effects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of items in the dropdown menu.
      Returns:
      a styled ComboBox object.
